code: import React from'react';import'./InfoCard.css';import capa from'../Assets/livroGenerico.jpg';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var InfoCard=function InfoCard(_ref){var book=_ref.book,addItem=_ref.addItem;var navigate=useNavigate();var handleAddClick=function handleAddClick(){addItem(book);window.alert("Item adicionado ao carrinho");};var handleBuyClick=function handleBuyClick(){addItem(book);navigate('/cart');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"info-card",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container-fluid",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"book-img",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:capa,alt:"capa-do-livro"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"payment",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"book-title",children:book.titulo}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{className:"book-subtitle",children:["Autor: ",book.autores," | Editora: ",book.editora]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"book-value",children:["R$",book.valor]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleAddClick,className:"add-chart-btn btn",children:"Adicionar ao carrinho"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleBuyClick,className:"buy-btn btn",children:"Comprar"})]})]})})});};export default InfoCard;
